department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Procurement of (qty 27) 16 feet aluminum Jon Boat.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2024-05-28 at 2 p.m. EST. All bids submitted after 2 p.m. EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. This solicitation is for the procurement of (qty 27) 16 feet aluminum Jon Boat to be delivered ato Prescott, ON. This requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian Goods. Canadian Free Trade agreement applies. The lowest price, technically compliant proposal will be recommended for award. Suggested delivery is 4 weeks after contract award.
tags: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
full_summary:
=====================================

**Title:** 16 feet Aluminum Jon Boat Procurement

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Solicitation Number:** WS4576755421

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**End-User Entity:** Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)

**Non-Disclosure Agreement:**
The solicitation is subject to Canadian Government's Non-Disclosure Agreement (CNA).

**Tender Description:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals for the procurement of [REQ-26] no. boats are being replaced with **27 16 feet Aluminum Jon Boats** to be delivered to Prescott, ON.

**Goods/Services:**

* UNSPSC Code: 25111511, 25111512, 25111809
* Description:
	+ Oil or gas workboat
	+ Skiff
	+ Boat for oil or gas operation

**Selection Criteria:**
Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price and technical compliance.

**Language of the Tender:**
Both English and French are accepted.

**Contact Information:**
Rheaume, Martin (SPAC/PSPC)
offices are located at: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5

Phone: (Not available)
email: martin.rheaume@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Preferred Submission:**

It is the sole responsibility of the bidder to ensure that the bid is submitted online through Ariba Discovery or Canada Buys in accordance to provided deadlines.
